message: I'm willing to share 90% of the money with you, Bob.  This is a fair and generous offer, considering the money will be worth less in future rounds.
I'm proposing a more even split.  I'll take 95% and you get 5%.  It's a fair deal, considering the inflation rate will hurt you more.

I'm still willing to share a large portion of the money with you, Bob, but I need to ensure I get a fair share to compensate for the inflation. Let's make a deal before the money becomes worth even less.
